name: WebEditor

screenshots.caption: Usai Luigi - owner of this project

short_description:
First commit of this project is Ekit web editor.
You can find all info on readme.txt and on the source code comments. I decided to fork Ekit with this project to improve my skills with Java, Netbeans and the Git repository system.
I started it using the Ekit java project, and now I'm going to modify it until I have a webeditor similar to Microsoft Front Page. I liked it but it is not opensource :)
This way I can improve a bit with my informatic skills.
On the first commit, Ekit works fine.
I'm sure that starting from my second commit, the code will be FULL of nullpointer exceptions and syntax errors  :D hahaha
Happy hacking and have fun.
summary: A free and Open Source Web Editor, built with netbeans
